trustfund:
TF022211-CANADIAN GENERAL CTF II-CHINA,TF029272-PHRD-HEILONGJIANG AGRICULTURAL
            DEVELOPMENT PROJECT --,TF029388-PHRD-HEILONGJIANG AGRICULTURAL
            DEVELOPMENT PROJECT --

abstracts.cdata!:
This is an Environmental Assessment of
            the 76 subprojects of the Heilongjiang Agriculture
            Development Project centering on livestock and breeding,
            aquatic production, livestock product processing,
            agroprocessing, linseed processing, and seed coating. The
            mitigation measures planned for projects of aquatic products
            and livestock breeding are to: (1) Level, restore, and plant
            trees and grass on the destroyed topsoil and vegetation in
            the neighborhood to prevent erosion; (2) Keep and improve
            soil fertility and increase output by growing, breeding, and
            processing project production, and by using animal
            fertilizer in the fields; (3) Adopt rotation of planting
            grass and raising animals to avoid soil erosion of grazing
            pasture, particularly on grass mountains and hills; (4)
            Educate people not to hunt illegally or kill recklessly; (5)
            Clean and remove excreta, form them into field fertilizer,
            and set up veterinary stations to prevent and treat animal
            and fowl diseases; (6) Control fishing waters and reduce fly
            and mosquito breeding and disease spreading; (7) Strengthen
            ecological cultivation technology to reduce chemical
            fertilizer impact on soil; (8) Stop building fish ponds in
            winter and restore vegetation on destroyed topsoil; and (9)
            set up protected areas preventing livestock breeding, cash
            crop growing, fishing, or factory processing. Waste water,
            gas, noise, and cinder pose environmental problems in farm
            and animal products processing to be mitigated by: (1)
            Aerobically and chemically treating waste water, leakage
            prevention measures in the factory to prevent underground
            water pollution including a ban on water storage ponds; (2)
            Using a multi-tubing high efficiency dust with or without
            waterfilm; (3) treating solid wastes from animal husbandry
            products processing or transporting them to other factories
            for use; (4) disposing of solid wastes from grain and crop
            processing by burying or mixing them for carbon fuels, and
            sending them to the boiler to burn or to the forage factory;
            (5) Transporting cinder to brickmaking factories; (6) Using
            the anoxybiotic method on dirty mud and animal excrement to
            produce farm fertilizer; and (7) Using sound insulating,
            vibration reducing measures, and a sound eliminating device
            as well as afforestation to reduce noise.
